## messageAdded

Action creator for an action that should be called once new activity log message added.

**Parameters**

-   `message` **ActivityLogMessage** Activity log message that is added.

Returns **MessageAddedAction** An action.

## startFetchMessages

Action creator for an action that starts fetching of activity log messages.

**Parameters**

-   `limit` **[number][325]** Limit of count of messages to fetch. (optional, default `ACTIVITY_MESSAGES_LIMIT`)

Returns **{type: [string][326], limit: [number][325]}** An action.

## startFetchMessages

Function to start activity log messages fetch from database.

## doneFetchMessages

Action creator for an action to be called when activity log messages is fetched.

**Parameters**

-   `messages` **[Array][327]&lt;ActivityLogMessage>** Activity log messages that was fetched.

Returns **DoneFetchMessagesAction** An action.

## addDummyMessage

Action for an action that adds dummy activity log message for testing purposes.

Returns **AddDummyMessageAction** An action.

Action creator for an action that should be called once
mnemonic validation status is changed.

**Parameters**

-   `valid` **([boolean][328] | null)** Flag that shows if mnemonic is valid.

Returns **ChangeMnemonicValidAction** An action.

## makeStep

Action creator for make step action.
That action is used to toggle activation of testing mode.
Specifically, each toggling requires several (fixed amount of) steps to be made.

Returns **MakeStepAction** An action.

## resetSteps

Action creator for reset steps action.
That action is used to reset activation of testing mode.
Resets number of steps made to initial value.

Returns **ResetStepsAction** An action.

React Native Navigation navigator object.

## NavigatorComponent

**Extends Component**

Component that handles events from react-native-navigation and passes it as functions
to override.

**Parameters**

-   `props` **any** 

**Examples**

```javascript
class ScreenComponent extends NavigatorComponent {

  onDidAppear() {
    console.log('Screen appears on screen!');
  }

}
```

## titleStyle

Style object of the title

## icon

Icon of panel

## body

Body text of panel

## renderAdditionalInfo

Renders content between panel body and panel button

## onButtonClick

Callback on panel button click. Button appears only if this one is passed.

## buttonTitle

Title of panel button.

## renderBottom

Renders content below panel button.

## childrenContainerStyle

Style object to be passed into children container.

## PanelView

**Extends React.Component**

Component that renders common panel view. It is used to provide list or mosaic layout.

## PanelViewAlert

Component that renders an alert panel view for Nations Status

**Parameters**

-   `$0` **any** 
    -   `$0.status`  

Returns **React.Component** A component.

## nationName

Name of the Nation of citizenship

## styles

Component that renders the panel indicating the user is Citizen of a Nation

Returns **React.Component** A component.

## value

Value of the Switch.

## value

Text value of wrapped text field.

## label

Text label at the right of the Switch.

## label

Text label to be rendered below component. Used to show number of field.

## onValueChange

Callback to be called on Switch when changes value.

## SwitchLabeled

Generates a standard native Switch with a Label at the right

**Parameters**

-   `$0` **any** 
    -   `$0.onValueChange`  
    -   `$0.value`  
    -   `$0.label`  

Returns **React.Component** A component.

## rowsCount

Count of rows in grid view.

## itemsPerRow

Count of columns in grid view.

## disableInactiveRows

Flag that specifies, if only one row (specified by activeRow prop)
should be shown as active.

## activeRow

Index of active row.

## activeRow

Number of active row in grid row.

## renderItem

Function to render item of the grid. Takes one parameter - index of item (number).

## GridView

**Extends React.Component**

Component to draw a grid of similar components.

## Component

Generates a customized Single/Multiselect component used in Create a Nation

## index

Used to identify component among each other.

## isLast

Determines if the field is last. This change behavior of keyboard handling.

## editable

Determines if text field should be editable.

## onChange

Callback on change text of wrapped text field.

## onSubmit

Callback on submit of wrapped text field.

## onFocus

Callback on focus of wrapped text field.

**Extends React.Component**

Component that renders text input view for private key input process.

**Parameters**

-   `props` **Props**

## balance

## onReceivePress

Callback on receive money button press

Component for rendering wallet details.

## configureStore

Configures a Redux store.

Returns **Store** Created store object.

## errorAlert

Shows common error alert. Use this to show any error to user.

**Parameters**

-   `error` **[Error][331]** Error to display

Returns **void** 

## alert

Shows common alert, used to simplify common code for i18n.

**Parameters**

-   `name` **[string][326]** Name of alert to determine texts for title, subtitle and buttons.
    I18n is used to get corresponding texts.
-   `buttons` **[Array][327]&lt;[Button][334]>** Array of buttons to display on alert.
-   `cancellable` **[boolean][328]** If alert is cancellable for Android. (optional, default `false`)

Returns **void** 

## convertHex

Convert a hex color and an opacity to an rgb or rgba color string

**Parameters**

-   `hex` **[string][326]** Hex string of color.
-   `opacity` **[number][325]** Value of desired opacity in range from 0 to 1. (optional, default `1`)

**Examples**

```javascript
convertHex("#FF120A")
```

```javascript
convertHex("#FF120A",0.3)
```

```javascript
convertHex("#FF120A", 30)
```

Returns **[string][326]** rgba color string.

## shadeOf

Calculates a shade of main color with specified opacity.

**Parameters**

-   `color` **[string][326]** Hex color string.
-   `opacity` **[number][325]** Value of desired opacity in range from 0 to 1.

**Examples**

```javascript
newShade = shadeOf("#12CCAA", 0.1) returns rgba(18,204,170,0.1)
```

Returns **[string][326]** Resulted rgba color string.

## shadeOfBitnationColor

Returns a shade of Bitnation color.

**Parameters**

-   `opacity` **[number][325]** Value of desired opacity in range from 0 to 1.

Returns **[string][326]** Resulted rgba color string.

## shadeOfBitnationLightColor

Returns a shade of Bitnation light color.

**Parameters**

-   `opacity` **[number][325]** Value of desired opacity in range from 0 to 1.

Returns **[string][326]** Resulted rgba color string.

## screen

Returns and object that represents a screen in React Native Navigation library.

**Parameters**

-   `name` **[string][326]** Name of the screen. Check Screens constant above for possible names.

Returns **[Object][335]** A screen object.

## mergeMessages

Function to merge two arrays of activity log messages.
Messages are compared by id and sorted in descending order of id (newest at the beginning).

**Parameters**

-   `currentMessages` **[Array][327]&lt;ActivityLogMessage>** Current messages array.
-   `newMessages` **[Array][327]&lt;ActivityLogMessage>** New messages array to be merged with current.
-   `limit` **[number][325]** Limit of count in resulted array. (optional, default `ACTIVITY_MESSAGES_LIMIT`)

Returns **[Array][327]&lt;ActivityLogMessage>** Merged messages.

-   `status` **[number][325]** 
-   `type` **[string][326]** 
-   `nation` **([NationType][329] | null)**

## NationType

Type: {id: [number][325], idInSmartContract: [number][325], created: [boolean][328], nationName: [string][326], nationDescription: [string][326], exists: [boolean][328], virtualNation: [boolean][328], nationCode: [string][326], lawEnforcementMechanism: [string][326], profit: [boolean][328], nonCitizenUse: [boolean][328], diplomaticRecognition: [boolean][328], decisionMakingProcess: [string][326], governanceService: [string][326], citizens: [number][325], joined: [boolean][328], txHash: [string][326]}

-   `id` **[number][325]** 
-   `idInSmartContract` **[number][325]**

-   `nationDescription` **[string][326]**

-   `virtualNation` **[boolean][328]**

-   `idInSmartContract` **[number][325]** 
-   `created` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `nationName` **[string][326]** 
-   `nationDescription` **[string][326]** 
-   `exists` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `virtualNation` **[boolean][328]**

## NationType

Type: {id: [number][325], idInSmartContract: [number][325], created: [boolean][328], nationName: [string][326], nationDescription: [string][326], exists: [boolean][328], virtualNation: [boolean][328], nationCode: [string][326], lawEnforcementMechanism: [string][326], profit: [boolean][328], nonCitizenUse: [boolean][328], diplomaticRecognition: [boolean][328], decisionMakingProcess: [string][326], governanceService: [string][326], citizens: [number][325], joined: [boolean][328], stateMutateAllowed: [boolean][328], resetStateMutateAllowed: [boolean][328], tx: ([TransactionJobType][337] | null)}

**Properties**

-   `id` **[number][325]** internal id of the dataset
-   `idInSmartContract` **[number][325]** is the id in the nation smart contract. If not this will be -1.
-   `created` **[boolean][328]** mean's if it is written to the blockchain (@todo this is probably an redundant field since you can get this information from "idInSmartContract")
-   `nationName` **[string][326]** human readable name of the nation
-   `nationDescription` **[string][326]** human readable description of the nation
-   `exists` **[boolean][328]** Does the nation already exists?
-   `virtualNation` **[boolean][328]** Is it a virtual nation?
-   `nationCode` **[string][326]** The nation code of law.
-   `lawEnforcementMechanism` **[string][326]** 
-   `profit` **[boolean][328]** Is this nation a for profit use?
-   `nonCitizenUse` **[boolean][328]** Can non citizens use the services?
-   `diplomaticRecognition` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `decisionMakingProcess` **[string][326]** 
-   `governanceService` **[string][326]** 
-   `citizens` **[number][325]** Number of citizens
-   `joined` **[boolean][328]** Did I join the nation?
-   `stateMutateAllowed` **[boolean][328]** Hold information about if we can mutate the state of this nation. Since we only support synchronous mutate of the nation state (join/leave nation).
-   `determinants` **[boolean][328]** if we should reset (set to true) the  stateMutateAllowed on the next indexing round.
-   `tx` **([TransactionJobType][337] | null)** A transaction. It can be e.g. a transaction that is responsible for writing the nation to the blockchain.
-   `id` **[number][325]** 
-   `idInSmartContract` **[number][325]** 
-   `created` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `nationName` **[string][326]** 
-   `nationDescription` **[string][326]** 
-   `exists` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `virtualNation` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `nationCode` **[string][326]** 
-   `lawEnforcementMechanism` **[string][326]** 
-   `profit` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `nonCitizenUse` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `diplomaticRecognition` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `decisionMakingProcess` **[string][326]** 
-   `governanceService` **[string][326]** 
-   `citizens` **[number][325]** 
-   `joined` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `stateMutateAllowed` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `resetStateMutateAllowed` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `tx` **([TransactionJobType][337] | null)** 

## NationType

Type: {id: [number][325], idInSmartContract: [number][325], created: [boolean][328], nationName: [string][326], nationDescription: [string][326], exists: [boolean][328], virtualNation: [boolean][328], nationCode: [string][326], lawEnforcementMechanism: [string][326], profit: [boolean][328], nonCitizenUse: [boolean][328], diplomaticRecognition: [boolean][328], decisionMakingProcess: [string][326], governanceService: [string][326], citizens: [number][325], joined: [boolean][328], stateMutateAllowed: [boolean][328], resetStateMutateAllowed: [boolean][328], tx: ([TransactionJobType][337] | null)}

**Properties**

-   `id` **[number][325]** internal id of the dataset
-   `idInSmartContract` **[number][325]** is the id in the nation smart contract. If not this will be -1.
-   `created` **[boolean][328]** mean's if it is written to the blockchain (@todo this is probably an redundant field since you can get this information from "idInSmartContract")
-   `nationName` **[string][326]** human readable name of the nation
-   `nationDescription` **[string][326]** human readable description of the nation
-   `exists` **[boolean][328]** Does the nation already exists?
-   `virtualNation` **[boolean][328]** Is it a virtual nation?
-   `nationCode` **[string][326]** The nation code of law.
-   `lawEnforcementMechanism` **[string][326]** 
-   `profit` **[boolean][328]** Is this nation a for profit use?
-   `nonCitizenUse` **[boolean][328]** Can non citizens use the services?
-   `diplomaticRecognition` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `decisionMakingProcess` **[string][326]** 
-   `governanceService` **[string][326]** 
-   `citizens` **[number][325]** Number of citizens
-   `joined` **[boolean][328]** Did I join the nation?
-   `stateMutateAllowed` **[boolean][328]** Hold information about if we can mutate the state of this nation. Since we only support synchronous mutate of the nation state (join/leave nation).
-   `determinants` **[boolean][328]** if we should reset (set to true) the  stateMutateAllowed on the next indexing round.
-   `tx` **([TransactionJobType][337] | null)** A transaction. It can be e.g. a transaction that is responsible for writing the nation to the blockchain.
-   `id` **[number][325]** 
-   `idInSmartContract` **[number][325]** 
-   `created` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `nationName` **[string][326]** 
-   `nationDescription` **[string][326]** 
-   `exists` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `virtualNation` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `nationCode` **[string][326]** 
-   `lawEnforcementMechanism` **[string][326]** 
-   `profit` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `nonCitizenUse` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `diplomaticRecognition` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `decisionMakingProcess` **[string][326]** 
-   `governanceService` **[string][326]** 
-   `citizens` **[number][325]** 
-   `joined` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `stateMutateAllowed` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `resetStateMutateAllowed` **[boolean][328]** 
-   `tx` **([TransactionJobType][337] | null)** 

## schemata

All available schemas. including there version and migration.

## ethDaemon

Implementation of the JsonRpcNodeInterface which is used to communicate with the ethereum chain

Type: JsonRpcNodeInterface

## osDependencies

This module provides some functionality for Panthalassa such as crypto functions

Type: OsDependenciesInterface

## secureStorage

Implementation of the secure storage Panthalassa specification and is used to save sensitive data. You are unlikely to use this. It's required by Panthalassa modules.

Type: SecureStorageInterface

## CurrencyType

Utility type to be used as possible currency values.

Type: `"ETH"`

## WalletType

Wallet type used in the app.

Type: {ethAddress: [string][326], currency: [CurrencyType][338], balance: ([string][326] | null), name: [string][326]}

**Properties**

-   `ethAddress` **[string][326]** 
-   `currency` **[CurrencyType][338]** 
-   `balance` **([string][326] | null)** 
-   `name` **[string][326]** 

## createGiftedChatMessageObject

Function that creates the list of messages to be consumed by GiftedChat

**Parameters**

-   `messagesData` **[Array][327]&lt;any>** Array of message data

Returns **[Array][327]&lt;any>** An array of formatted messages data

## roundEth

Round to 5 digits

**Parameters**

-   `eth` **[string][326]** String value of eth amount to be rounded.

Returns **[string][326]** Rounded string value that represents eth amount to 5 digits

## prettyWalletBalance

Provide string for wallet balance even if it is undefined

**Parameters**

-   `wallet` **[object][335]** Wallet object
-   `currency` **[object][335]** Current symbol after amount, default is "ETH"
-   `successfulSuffix` **[object][335]** Suffix to add if balance is present

Returns **[string][326]** Formatted balance + successful suffix if balance defined,
corresponding string if not defined.

## shortEthAddress

Shorten ethereum address for compact displaying.

**Parameters**

-   `address` **[string][326]** Address to be shortened.

**Examples**

```javascript
const shortAddr = shortEthAddress("0x999d1ce359692aebc26cd969a31d47d150128600")

// Will log: 0x999...28600
console.log(shortAddr);
```

Returns **[string][326]** Short version of address.

## compressMnemonic

Function to convert mnemonic from array to string.

**Parameters**

-   `mnemonic` **Mnemonic** Mnemonic array to convert.

Returns **[string][326]** Converted mnemonic string.

## resolveNation

Function to get a nation by id from array.

**Parameters**

-   `nations` **[Array][327]&lt;[NationType][329]>** List of nations
-   `id` **[number][325]** Id of the nation

Returns **[NationType][329]?** Nation or null if there is no nation with that id.

## NationStatusCode

0 = unknown | 200 = pending | 300 = succeed | 400 = failed
(take a look at the transaction queue for the status codes)

Type: (`0` \| `200` \| `300` \| `400`)

## NationStatusType

Describes type of operation that status is related to, e.g. join, leave, create, etc.

Type: (`"NONE"` \| `"NATION_JOIN"` \| `"NATION_LEAVE"` \| `"NATION_CREATE"`)

## NationStatus

Type: {key: [string][326], type: [NationStatusType][339], code: [NationStatusCode][340]}

**Properties**

-   `key` **[string][326]** Translation key of the status
-   `type` **[NationStatusType][339]** Type of the status
-   `code` **[NationStatusCode][340]** Code of the status
-   `key` **[string][326]** 
-   `type` **[NationStatusType][339]** 
-   `code` **[NationStatusCode][340]** 

## resolveStatus

Takes a nation and returns the status that should be displayed to the user

**Parameters**

-   `nation` **[NationType][329]** Nation to get a status for.

Returns **[NationStatus][341]?** Nation status or null if status is not defined.

## nationIsDraft

Returns true if nation is a draft, false otherwise.

**Parameters**

-   `nation` **[NationType][329]** Nation to be checked.

Returns **[boolean][328]** True if nation is a draft, false otherwise.

## convertToDatabase

Converts app nation model to database model.

**Parameters**

-   `nationData` **[NationType][329]** Nation data to be converted.

Returns **DBNationType** Database nation model.

## convertFromDatabase

Converts nation from database model to app model.

**Parameters**

-   `nation` **DBNationType** Database model of nation to be converted.

Returns **[NationType][329]** Converted app nation model.

## convertToEditingNation

Convert NationType value to EditingNationType value

**Parameters**

-   `nation` **[NationType][329]** Nation to convert

Returns **EditingNationType** Convert nation.

## nationIsValid

Validates the nation information.

**Parameters**

-   `nation` **EditingNationType** Nation information to validate.

Returns **[boolean][328]** Boolean value if the nation is valid.

## fontSizeNormalizer

Function to normalize Font sizes depending on screen size

**Parameters**

-   `size` **[number][325]** The original font size

Returns **[number][325]** The new font size depending the current screen

## normalWidthMargin

Function to calculate the margin of a component using 2/3 of screen

Returns **[number][325]** The margin to be applied in each side

## isiPhoneX

Function to check if the device it's an iPhone X

Returns **[boolean][328]** True if it is

## isiPhoneXStatusBar

Function to fix the height of Status Bar ONLY in the iPhoneX

**Parameters**

-   `size` **[number][325]** The actual device's screen size

Returns **[number][325]** The correct size for the Status Bar

## isiPhoneXTabBar

Function to fix the height of Fake Tab Bar ONLY in the iPhoneX

**Parameters**

-   `size` **[number][325]** The actual device's screen size

Returns **[number][325]** The correct size for the Fake Tab Bar

## saveShouldBeEnabled

Function that checks for the save enabled status

**Parameters**

-   `user` **[ProfileType][332]** User object that is currently saved in the database
-   `editingUser` **[ProfileType][332]** User object that is currently being edited

Returns **[boolean][328]** Save enabled status

## resolveWallet

Gets wallet by address from array of wallets.

**Parameters**

-   `wallets` **[Array][327]&lt;[WalletType][333]>** Array of wallets.
-   `address` **[string][326]** Address of wallet to be got.

Returns **[WalletType][333]?** Wallet or no if there is no wallet with that address.

## getWalletIndex

Gets wallet index by address in array of wallets.

**Parameters**

-   `wallets` **[Array][327]&lt;[WalletType][333]>** Array of wallets.
-   `address` **[string][326]** Address of wallet to be got.

Returns **[number][325]** Index of wallet or null if there is no wallet with that address.

## convertWallets

Converts wallet from libs representation.

**Parameters**

-   `wallets` **[Object][335]** Dictionary that contains addresses as keys and private keys as values.

Returns **[Array][327]&lt;[WalletType][333]>** Array of converted wallets.
